$$$DOC.text:
LUTHERAN MEDICAL CENTER
                    8300 W38th ST.
                    Wheat Ridge, Colo 80033
                 VARIOUS ISPF/CLISTS & EDIT MACROS
               -----------------------------------

**********************************************************************

      THESE CLISTS AND ASSOCIATED PROGRAMS AND SCREENS HAVE BEEN VERY
 USEFUL IN CUSTOMIZING OUR ISPF ENVIRONMENT.

               ( ...... USE AT YOUR OWN RISK ......)

    WE DO NOT GUARANTEE TO KEEP ANY MATERIAL PROVIDED UP TO DATE NOR
 DO WE GUARANTEE TO PROVIDE ANY CORRECTIONS OR EXTENSIONS DESCRIBED
 BY THE USER OR CORRECTIONS OR EXTENSIONS MADE IN THE FUTURE.


************************* SELECTION PANEL: *********************
   MAIN PANEL:  TECHSERV

   This is a selection menu... use a SELECT PANEL(TECHSERV) from your main
   panel or other menu panel under ISPF.

   ************************* CLISTS: *********************

I) ONLINE IDCAMS:
    The online idcams is a rudimentary first or second blush attempt with
    lots of "blue sky" for the interested party.  It works reliably, but
    has the look of several layers of prototyping - command backout has
    a problem.  See panel 'TECHSERV' for sample entry to main clist.
    This started out as a scrollable LISTCAT, but is useful for GDG
    indexs, recataloging tapes, VERIFY's, etc.

    1) CLISTS:
       IDCAMLMA - COMMAND MODELS
       IDCAMLMB
       IDCAMLMC
       IDCAMLMD
       IDCAMLMG
       IDCAMLMI
       IDCAMLMK
       IDCAMLML
       IDCAMLMN
       IDCAMLMP
       IDCAMLMR
       IDCAMLMV
       IDCAMLMX
       IDCAMLST - MAIN LOGIC
       IDCAMPRT - PRINT LAST OUTPUT

    2) PANELS:
       IDCAMP10 - PRINT
       IDCAML10 - MAIN PANEL
       IDCAMLSH - MAIN PANEL HELP (PF1)

    3) BAL PROGRAM:
       IDCAMSPF - ALTERS DDS, ALLOWS FOR SPLIT SCREEN FUNCTION.
       --  CLIST IDCAMLST ASSUMES THIS IS IN SYS1.LINKLIST, BUT IT MAY
           BE IN ANY LIBRARY - FIND THE CALL AND MODIFY.
       --  REQUIRES SYS1.MACLIB AND SYS1.AMODGEN IN ASSEMBLY

II)BATCH COMPILE FROM ISPF:

    This is a sample batch compile from ispf - two versions: one with a
    backup and one without - file must be cataloged and on disk!

    1) CLISTS:
       ISPCOMPC - MAIN LOGIC ==> CUSTOMIZE YOUR JOBCARD HERE!

    2) PANELS:
       ISPCOMP  - MAIN PANEL
       ISPCOMPH - HELP PANEL

    3) PROC:
       ISPCOMPP - PROC PULLS IN SYMBOLICS ETC - IN PROCLIB
                - USES "TMP.your.dsn" AS A BACKUP DATASET!
       ISPCOMPF - PROC FOR "FAST" COMPRESS.


III)FAST LOGOFF FROM ISPF:

    This can save many 'OGOFFS'.

    1) CLISTS:
       L        - ISSUES A LOGOFF.


IV)RECURSIVE ISPF MENUS:

    Using this single line CLIST, you can get another initial ISPF panel
    over and over again!!  Watch out, however, for 'recursion errors' and
    table errors when recursing anything but Edit, Browse and SDSF!
    Usually only one version of a 3.x utility is allowed per recursion
    string -- really useful for popping off to view SDSF in the middle
    of something else.  Each 'split' of your screen constitutes a 'recursion
    string.'

    1) CLISTS:
       MENU -- assumes your primary menu is 'ISP@MSTR'.
               Enter this by typing from any ISPF command line:
                    'TSO MENU'  or 'TSO %MENU'

V) EDIT MACROS:

    Just type JOBCARD from the Edit Command line: it appears at the top
    of the panel.

    1) CLISTS:
       JOBCARD - customize to your standards.         .
       DDDISK  - creates a disk DD statement after your cursor.
       DDTAPE  - creates a tape DD statement after your cursor.
**********************************************************************


         ADDITIONAL INFORMATION CAN BE OBTAINED FROM -

                  Randall Smith
                  Lutheran Medical Center
                  Information Systems
                  8300 W.38th St
                  Wheat Ridge, Colo 80033

                  Telephone 303-425-2185

DDDISK.text:
ISREDIT MACRO
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR   = '//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG)'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = +
        '//            DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,BLKSIZE=15440,LRECL=80),'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1)),'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//            VOL=SER=XXXXXX,'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//            UNIT=SYSDA,'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//DDNAME   DD DSNAME=ANY.NAME,'

DDTAPE.text:
ISREDIT MACRO
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG)'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = +
  '//            LABEL=(1,SL,EXPDT=99000),     ** 98000 FOR NON-TMS **'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = +
        '//            DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,BLKSIZE=32720,LRECL=80),'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//            VOL=(,RETAIN,SER=XXXXXX),'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//            UNIT=(TAPE,,DEFER),'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//***         UNIT=AFF=PREVDD,'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER .ZCSR = '//DDNAME   DD DSNAME=ANY.NAME,'

IDCAMLMA.text:
/******* IDCAMS FROM ISPF - ALIAS PARMS
CONTROL  MSG
ISPEXEC  VGET (UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3)
SET      SP1 = &NRSTR(&UCMMD)
SET      SP2 = &NRSTR(&UENTITY)
SET      SP3 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM)
SET      SP4 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM2)
SET      SP5 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM3)
SET      UCMMD = &STR(DEFINE ALIAS)
SET      UENTITY = &STR((NAME(YOUR.ALIAS                 )
SET      UNPARM  = &STR(RELATE(YOUR.ORIGINAL             ))
SET      UNPARM  = &UNPARM)
SET      UNPARM2 = &STR( )
SET      UNPARM3 = &STR( )
ISPEXEC VPUT (SP1 SP2 SP3 SP4 SP5 UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3)
END

IDCAMLMB.text:
/******* IDCAMS FROM ISPF - BACKOUT
CONTROL  MSG
ISPEXEC  VGET (SP1 SP2 SP3 SP4 SP5)
SET      UCMMD   = &NRSTR(&SP1)
SET      UENTITY = &NRSTR(&SP2)
SET      UNPARM  = &NRSTR(&SP3)
SET      UNPARM2 = &NRSTR(&SP4)
SET      UNPARM3 = &NRSTR(&SP5)
ISPEXEC  VPUT (UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3)
END

IDCAMLMC.text:
/******* IDCAMS FROM ISPF - CATALOG PARMS
CONTROL  MSG
ISPEXEC  VGET (UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3)

SET      SP2 = &NRSTR(&UENTITY)
SET      SP3 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM)
SET      SP4 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM2)
SET      SP5 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM3)
SET      UCMMD = &STR(DEFINE NVSAM)
SET      UENTITY = &STR((NAME(YOUR.CATALOG.ENTRY              )
SET      UNPARM  = &STR(DEVICETYPE(TAPE) VOLUMES(000000) )
SET      UNPARM2 = &STR(FILESEQUENCENUMBERS(1) )
SET      UNPARM2 = &UNPARM2)
SET      UNPARM3 = &STR( )
ISPEXEC VPUT (SP1 SP2 SP3 SP4 SP5 UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3)
END

IDCAMLMI.text:

SET      SP5 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM3)

IDCAMLMK.text:
/******* IDCAMS FROM ISPF - VSAM CLUSTER PARMS
CONTROL  MSG
ISPEXEC  VGET (UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3)
SET      SP1 = &NRSTR(&UCMMD)
SET      SP2 = &NRSTR(&UENTITY)
SET      SP3 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM)
SET      SP4 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM2)
SET      SP5 = &NRSTR(&UNPARM3)
SET      UCMMD = &STR(DEFINE CL)
SET UENTITY = &STR((NAME(YOUR.CLUSTER.NAME ) MODEL(SYS3.SAMP.VSAM    )
SET      UNPARM  = &STR(VOL(AAAAAA)
SET      UNPARM  = &UNPARM)
SET      UNPARM2 = &STR(DATA(NAME(YOUR.DATA.NAME) SPEED) )
SET      UNPARM3 = &STR(INDEX(NAME(YOUR.INDEX.NAME) )
ISPEXEC VPUT (SP1 SP2 SP3 SP4 SP5 UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3)
END

IDCAMLSB.text:
/******* IDCAMS FROM ISPF - BACKUP TO LAST PARMS
CONTROL  MSG
ISPEXEC  VGET (SP1 SP2 SP3 SP4)
SET      &UCMMD   = &SP1
SET      &UENTITY = &SP2
SET      &UNPARM = &SP3
SET      &UNPARM2 = &SP4
ISPEXEC  VPUT (UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2)
END

IDCAMLSH.text:
)ATTR
% TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
+ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)
# TYPE(INPUT) JUST(RIGHT) PAD(0)
@ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) PAD(_)
/****  THIS PANEL WORKS WITH THE CLIST IDCAMLST/PGM IDCAMSPF TO PRODUCE A
/****  IDCAMS ONLINE REPORT: LISTCAT PRIMARILY, BUT ANY FUNCTION WILL DO.
)BODY
%------------------- LMC IDCAMS ONLINE SELECTION HELP PANEL --------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
+                                                            +USERID - &ZUSER
+    Warning!! Use non-LISTCAT commands only at your own     +DATE   - &ZDATE
+              risk.  No guarantees are implied by the       +J-DATE - &ZJDATE
+              presence or features of this panel.  This     +TIME   - &ZTIME
+              is not a substitute for knowing IDCAMS.       +PANEL  - IDCAMLSH
+
%The IDCAMS Online panel was developed to implement some IDCAMS features online.
%     Its primary use is to view/print LISTCAT output.
%
%The command models supported are:
% A:+Alias definition.                      % L:+Listcat.
% B:+Backout to before last model request.  % N:+Name Altered.
% C:+Cat./Recat. non-VSAM entry (e.g. TAPE).% P:+Print.
% D:+Delete an entity.                      % R:+Repro disk files.
% G:+Define a GDG Index.                    % V:+Verify a dataset.
% I:+ICF Catalog Diagnose.                  % X:+Examine a cluster component.
% K:+Define a KSDS VSAM cluster using MODEL.
)INIT
  &ZCMD = ' '
)PROC
)END

IDCAMLST.text:
/******* IDCAMS FROM ISPF - USE WITH PANEL IDCAML10
CONTROL  MSG
ISPEXEC  VGET (ZSCREEN)
SET      SI = TMPIN&ZSCREEN
SET      SP = TMPPRIN&ZSCREEN
/******* ALLOCATE IDCAMS FILES; DISPLAY PANEL
ALLOC    FI(&SI) NEW SP(1) TRACKS UNIT(VIO) LRECL(80) RECFM(F) REUSE
ALLOC    FI(&SP) NEW SP(1 5) TRACKS REUSE +
         BLKSIZE(2004) LRECL(125) DSORG(PS) RECFM(V B A)
ISPEXEC  LMINIT DATAID(MYDATA) DDNAME(&SP)
DISPLAY: ISPEXEC  DISPLAY PANEL(IDCAML10)
SET      &TESTCC = &LASTCC
IF       &TESTCC ¬= 0 THEN GOTO ENDER
IF       .&P ¬= . THEN GOTO PRINTER
IF       .&M ¬= . THEN GOTO MODELER
OPENFILE &SI OUTPUT
SET      &&SI = &STR( &UCMMD -)
PUTFILE  &SI
SET      &&SI = &STR( &UENTITY -)
PUTFILE  &SI
SET      &&SI = &STR( &UNPARM -)
PUTFILE  &SI
SET      &&SI = &STR( &UNPARM2 -)
PUTFILE  &SI
SET      &&SI = &STR( &UNPARM3)
PUTFILE  &SI
CLOSFILE &SI
/******* IDCAMS EXECUTION
IDCAMS:  CALL 'SYS1.LINKLIB(IDCAMSPF)' '&ZSCREEN'
ISPEXEC  BROWSE DATAID(&MYDATA)
GOTO     DISPLAY
PRINTER: %IDCAMPRT
GOTO     DISPLAY
MODELER: %IDCAMLM&M
ISPEXEC  VGET (UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3 SP1 SP2 SP3 SP4)
GOTO     DISPLAY
ENDER:   ISPEXEC  VPUT (UCMMD UENTITY UNPARM UNPARM2 UNPARM3) PROFILE
IF       .&MYDATA > . THEN ISPEXEC LMFREE DATAID(&MYDATA)
CONTROL  NOMSG
FREE     FI(&SP &SI)
END

IDCAML10.text:
)ATTR
% TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
+ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)
# TYPE(INPUT) JUST(RIGHT) PAD(0)
@ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) PAD(_)
/****  THIS PANEL WORKS WITH THE CLIST IDCAMLST/PGM IDCAMSPF TO PRODUCE A
/****  IDCAMS ONLINE REPORT: LISTCAT PRIMARILY, BUT ANY FUNCTION WILL DO.
)BODY
%------------------- LMC IDCAMS ONLINE SELECTION -------------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
%                                                            +USERID - &ZUSER
%                                                            +DATE   - &ZDATE
%                                                            +J-DATE - &ZJDATE
%IDCAMS VERB          %==>_UCMMD       %<==                  +TIME   - &ZTIME
+     ==> e.g.  LISTCAT                                      +PANEL  - IDCAML10
%
%INPUT IDCAMS 1ST PARM%==>_UENTITY                                             +
+     ==> e.g.  LVL(your.index)  or  ENT(your.dsn) -- no quotes required
%
%INPUT NEXT PARM       ==>_UNPARM                                              +
+     ==> e.g.  NAME or VOL or ALL
%
%INPUT ANY ADDITIONAL  ==>_UNPARM2                                             +
%                      ==>_UNPARM3                                             +
%
%Print Last Output?   %==>_P%<==
+
+Model ==>_M+<==
)INIT
  .HELP = IDCAMLSH
  .CURSOR = UENTITY
  &ZCMD = ' '
  IF (&UCMMD = ' ')
    &UCMMD = 'LISTCAT'
  IF (&UENTITY = ' ')
    &UENTITY = 'LVL(&ZUSER)'
  &P = ' '
  &M  = ' '
)PROC
  IF (&P = ' ')
    VER(&UENTITY,NONBLANK)             /*     REQUIRED FIELD         */
  IF (&M ¬= ' ')
    VER(&M,LIST,A,B,C,D,G,I,K,L,N,P,R,V,X) /* MUST MAKE THIS LIST   */
)END

IDCAMPRT.text:
/******* IDCAMS FROM ISPF - USE WITH PANEL IDCAMP10
CONTROL  MSG
SET RCODE = 0
ERROR +
DO
 SET RCODE = &LASTCC
 IF  &RCODE = 400 THEN GOTO ENDER
 ELSE EXIT
END
DISPLAY: ISPEXEC  DISPLAY PANEL(IDCAMP10)
SET      &TESTCC = &LASTCC
IF       &TESTCC ¬= 0 THEN GOTO ENDER
IF       .&O     = . THEN SET &O = A
IF       .&FORM ¬= . THEN SET &VFORM = &STR(FORMS(&FORM))
IF       .&FCB  ¬= . THEN SET &VFCB  = &STR(FCB(&FCB))
IF       .&CPY  ¬= . THEN SET &VCPY  = &STR(COPIES(&CPY))
IF       .&DEST ¬= . THEN SET &VDEST = &STR(DEST(&DEST))
ISPEXEC  VGET (ZSCREEN) SHARED
ALLOC    FI(OUTTER) SYSOUT(&O) &VFORMS &VFCB &VCPY &VDEST REUSE +
         BLKSIZE(2004) LRECL(125) RECFM(V B A)
OPENFILE TMPPRIN&ZSCREEN INPUT
OPENFILE OUTTER OUTPUT
IF &ZSCREEN = 2 THEN GOTO GETTER2
GETTER:  GETFILE  TMPPRIN1
  IF       &LASTCC ¬= 0 THEN GOTO ENDER
  SET      OUTTER = &TMPPRIN1
  PUTFILE  OUTTER
  GOTO     GETTER
GETTER2: GETFILE  TMPPRIN2
  IF       &LASTCC ¬= 0 THEN GOTO ENDER
  SET      OUTTER = &TMPPRIN2
  PUTFILE  OUTTER
  GOTO     GETTER2
ENDER:   +
CLOSFILE TMPPRIN&ZSCREEN
CLOSFILE OUTTER
WRITE PRINT COMPLETED!
FREE     FI(OUTTER)
END

IDCAMP10.text:
)ATTR
+ TYPE(TEXT)  INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
¬ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(NON)
_ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW)
@ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) PAD(_)
/****
/****
)BODY
%---------------------- LMC IDCAMS OUTPUT PRINT PANEL --------------------------
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD                        +VERB   - &UCMMD                     +
%                                         +USERID - &ZUSER
%                                         +DATE   - &ZDATE
%                                         +J-DATE - &ZJDATE
%                                         +TIME   - &ZTIME
%
+ENTER OUTPUT CLASS      %==>_O+
+ENTER OUTPUT FORM       %==>@FORM+
+ENTER OUTPUT FCB        %==>@FCB +
+ENTER OUTPUT COPIES     %==>@CPY+
+ENTER OUTPUT DESTINATION%==>@DEST  +
%
)INIT
  .HELP = ISR49000
  .CURSOR = O
  IF (&O = ' ')
     &O = 'A'
  IF (&CPY  = ' ')
      &CPY  = '1'
)PROC
  IF (&ZCMD  ¬= ' ' )  .MSG = SYBTM001  /* INDICATE COMMAND NOT VALID */
  VPUT (O,FORM,FCB,CPY,DEST) SHARED
  VPUT (O,FORM,FCB,CPY,DEST) PROFILE
)END

IDCAMSPF.text:
IDCAMSPF TITLE 'CALL IDCAMS FOR SPLIT SCREEN ISPF'
***********************************************************************
*    AUTHOR:       RANDALL SMITH          3/09/89                     *
*    ATTRIBUTES:   NONE                                               *
*    ALIAS:        NONE                                               *
*    SYSTEM:       MVS/SP1.3                                          *
***********************************************************************
*                                                                     *
*             MODULE NAME = IDCAMSPF                                  *
*                                                                     *
*             THIS MODULE CALLS IDCAMS FOR ISPF IN SPLIT SCREEN       *
*              MODE.  DD'S WILL BE TMPIN1 AND TMPPRIN1 OR TMPIN2      *
*              AND TMPPRIN2 DEPENDING ON THE SPLIT SCREEN BEING       *
*              USED (SEE &ZSCREEN VARIABLE IN ISPF).                  *
*                                                                     *
*              CALLER OF THIS PROGRAM (E.G. ISPF) MUST SUPPLY A 1 OR  *
*               2 IN THE EXECUTE PARM STATEMENT.                      *
*                                                                     *
*              MUST BE IN SAME LIBRARY AS IDCAMS FOR TSO PERFORMANCE  *
*               REASONS.                                              *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
*        REGISTER USAGE FOLLOWS...                                    *
R0       EQU   0                   WORK REG                           *
R1       EQU   1                   PTR TO INPUT PARM                  *
R2       EQU   2                   WORK REG                           *
R4       EQU   4                   WORK REG                           *
R11      EQU   11                  PTR TO FIRST MESSAGE IF NOZERO PARM*
R12      EQU   12                  BASE REG                           *
R13      EQU   13                  PTR TO IPOSAVE                     *
R14      EQU   14                  LINKAGE REG                        *
R15      EQU   15                  LINKAGE REG                        *
ML       EQU   1                   MSG LENGTH                         *
***********************************************************************
IDCAMSPF CSECT                     BEGINING OF PROGRAM
         USING *,R12               SET UP BASE REG
         SAVE  (14,12)             SAVE REGESTERS
         LR    R12,R15             SET UP ADDRESSABILITY
         LR    R2,R13              SAVE ADDR OF PREVIOUS SAVEAREA
         LA    R13,IPOSAVE         POINT TO CURRENT SAVEAREA
         ST    R13,8(R2)           LINK PREVIOUS SAVEAREA TO IPOSAVE
         ST    R2,4(R13)           LINK IPOSAVE TO PREVIOUS SAVEAREA
         LR    R11,R1              PTR PARM ADDR - FIRST COMMAND
         L     R11,0(R11)          SAVE ADDR OF PARM IN R11
         B     IPOPARM             BRANCH OVER VIEWABLE MESSAGE
         DC    C'MUST BE IN SAME PDS AS IDCAMS FOR PERFORMANCE'
***                                ADD JOB'S NAME TO MESSAGE.
IPOPARM  LH    R2,0(R11)           LENGTH TO R2
RANDALL  LA    R2,ML               RESET PARM LENGTH TO MAX
IPOMOVE  MVC   IPOMSG,2(R11)       MOVE PARM
         MVC   SYSINX+5(1),IPOMSG  MOVE PARM TO DDNAME
         MVC   SYSPRINX+7(1),IPOMSG MOVE PARM TO DDNAME
         LOAD  EP=IDCAMS           LOAD IDCAMS
         LR    15,0                CAPTURE IDCAMS ADDRESS
         CALL  (15),(OPTIONS,DDNAMES),VL  GIVE IDCAMS A CALL
IPOEND   L     R13,IPOSAVE+4       RESTORE R13
         RETURN (14,12),T,RC=0     RETURN TO MVS
IPOSAVE  DS    18F                 IPOSAVE AREA
IPOAREA  DC    0F'0',AL2(ML+4,0)   LENGTH FOR OUTPUT IF RECFM=VB
IPOMSG   DC    CL(ML)' '           STORAGE FOR ONE PARM
OPTIONS  DC    H'0'                NO GNU OPTIONS
DDNAMES  DS    0F                  CHANGE DDAMES TO ISPF VERSIONS
         DC    H'48'               LENGTH IS 6 - 8 BYTE ENTRIES
         DC    XL8'00'             JUST ZEROS
         DC    XL8'00'             JUST ZEROS
         DC    XL8'00'             JUST ZEROS
         DC    XL8'00'             JUST ZEROS
SYSINX   DC    CL8'TMPINX'         SYSIN DD NAME
SYSPRINX DC    CL8'TMPPRINX'       SYSPRINT DD NAME
         LTORG                   , LTORG NEEDED FOR ADDRESSABILITY
         END                     , END OF PROGRAM

ISPCOMP.text:
)ATTR
% TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
+ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)
# TYPE(INPUT) JUST(RIGHT) PAD(0)
@ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) PAD(_)
)BODY
%-------------------------- BATCH COMPRESS PANEL -------------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%
+ISPF LIBRARY:                       %*** Press PF3 after last compress. **
+   PROJECT%===>_PRJ1    +
+   GROUP  %===>_LIB1    +
+   TYPE   %===>_TYP1    +
+
+OTHER PARTITIONED DATA SET:
+   DATA SET NAME %===>_DSN
+    (Must be cataloged.)
+
+JOB PARMS:
+   JOB RUN CLASS    %===>_J+
+   JOB OUTPUT PARMS %===>_JPARM                                               +
+    (//JOBOUT OUTPUT JESDS=ALL,DEFAULT=YES,your.parms...)
+
+FAST COMPRESS (no backup) ?: _Q+
+  (Backup DSN is 'TMP.your.dsn'.)
)INIT
  .HELP = ISPCOMPH
  &ZCMD = ' '
  &Q = 'N'
  &J = &JCLASS
  IF (&J = ' ')
     &J = 'A'
  IF (&JPARM = ' ')
     &JPARM  = 'CLASS=X,DEST=LOCAL,FCB=88,FORMS=STD'
)PROC
 IF (&DSN = ' ' )
   VER (&PRJ1 NONBLANK)
   VER (&LIB1 NONBLANK)
   VER (&TYP1 NONBLANK)
 VER (&DSN DSNAME)
 &JCLASS = &J
  IF (&JCLASS = ' ')
     &JCLASS = 'A'
  IF (&JPARM = ' ')
     &JPARM  = 'CLASS=X,DEST=LOCAL,FCB=88,FORMS=STD'
 VPUT (JPARM JCLASS) SHARED
 VPUT (PRJ1 LIB1 TYP1) PROFILE
)END

ISPCOMPH.text:
)ATTR
% TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
+ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)
# TYPE(INPUT) JUST(RIGHT) PAD(0)
@ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) PAD(_)
/****  THIS PANEL WORKS WITH THE CLIST IDCAMLST/PGM IDCAMSPF TO PRODUCE A
/****  IDCAMS ONLINE REPORT: LISTCAT PRIMARILY, BUT ANY FUNCTION WILL DO.
)BODY
%------------------- LMC ONLINE/BATCH PDS COMPRESS -----------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
+                                                            +USERID - &ZUSER
%   The batch compress was developed to implement easy       +DATE   - &ZDATE
%   compresses from ISPF.                                    +J-DATE - &ZJDATE
+                                                            +TIME   - &ZTIME
+   The 'safe' compress is recommended since it backs up     +PANEL  - IDCAMLSH
+   the PDS first to a file named 'your.dsn.XX'.
+
+   However, if you can recover from other sources (e.g. FDR), then the 'fast'
+   compress is probably adequate.
+
+   The JOB CLASS option determines what run class your batch compress will
+   run in.
+
+   The JOB OUTPUT PARMS option sets the parms in a JOB level OUTPUT statement
+   which routes all output with the designated parms.
%      //JOBOUT OUTPUT JESDS=ALL,DEFAULT=YES,...
+   Default is 'CLASS=X,DEST=LOCAL,FCB=88,FORMS=STD'
)INIT
  &ZCMD = ' '
)PROC
)END

JOBCARD.text:
ISREDIT MACRO
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER 0 = "//&SYSUID.JOB JOB (0000,0000),'BATCH COMMENTS',"
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER 1 = '//****     RESTART=XXXXXXXX,'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER 2 = '//         MSGCLASS=X,'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER 3 = '//         NOTIFY=&SYSUID,'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER 4 = '//         REGION=1024K,'
ISREDIT LINE_AFTER 5 = '//         CLASS=A'

TECHSERV.text:
%-------------------  TECHNICAL SERVICES SELECTION MENU  -----------------------
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%                                                           +USERID   - &ZUSER
% MAINTENANCE:                                              +PROC     - &ZLOGON
%   A +ACTIVATOR   - CAI Installation and Maintenance Tool  +J-DATE   - &ZJDATE
%   M +SMP/E       - System Modification Program/E          +DATE     - &ZDATE
%                                                           +TIME     - &ZTIME
% SYSTEM AIDS:
%   C +COMPRESS    - Batch Compress from ISPF
%   I +IDCAMS      - IDCAMS Online
%
)INIT
  .HELP = ISR00003
  &ZHTOP = ISR00003   /* TUTORIAL TABLE OF CONTENTS        */
  &ZHINDEX = ISR91000 /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
)PROC
  &ZSEL = TRANS(TRUNC(&ZCMD,'.')
                A,'PGM(CACTVATE) NEWAPPL(CACT)'
                C,'CMD(%ISPCOMPC) NEWAPPL(LMC)'
                I,'CMD(%IDCAMLST) NEWAPPL(LMC)'
                M,'PGM(GIMISCV)'
              ' ',' '
                *,'?' )
)END
